contentList.content: Involved Patron
Your Patron Tasks you with a Quest on every <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. If you fulfill it, you will be rewarded.
Patron's Infused Weapon
Your Weapon is infused with your Patrons Power. Your Weapon Attacks additionally deal [1].
Patron's Demand
fourth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
fifth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
Deal at least [1] to an enemy to gain the favor of your Patron.
Use a Evocation Spell to gain the favor of your Patron.
Kill an Enemy with a Spell to gain the favor of your Patron.
Your Patron demands proof of your obedience, reduce your health to half or below.
Fiend's Advantage
Roll all your Damage with Advantage.
Kill [1] Enemies with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hexblade_Bind>Hexed Weapon</LSTag> to gain the favor of your Patron.
Kill an Enemy afflicted by the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEXBLADES_CURSE">Hexblade's Curse</LSTag> to gain the Favor of your Patron.
Dissatisfied Patron
You have often ignored your patron's duties. Continue to defy your patron and you will be punished. The power your patron gives you is not uncondtional.
Good Relations
Good Relatiions Description.
Bad Relations
Bad Relations Description.
Hexblade's Thirst
You gain an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">extra attack</LSTag> with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hexblade_Bind>Hexed Weapon</LSTag>.
